original_text:
For he has not despised or abhorred
    the affliction of the afflicted,
and he has not hidden his face from him,
    but has heard, when he cried to him.
korean_text: 그는 곤고한 자의 곤고를 멸시하거나 싫어하지 아니하시며 그의 얼굴을 그에게서 숨기지 아니하시고 그가 울부짖을 때에 들으셨도다

sentences.original_text: For he has not despised or abhorred
and he has not hidden his face from him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그에게서 자신의 얼굴을 숨기지 않았고
